verses.name: Ezekiel 6:1
verses.text: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 6:2
verses.text: Son of man, set thy face toward the mountains of Israel, and prophesy against them,

verses.name: Ezekiel 6:3
verses.text: And say, Ye mountains of Israel, hear the word of the Lord God; Thus saith the Lord God to the mountains, and to the hills, to the rivers, and to the valleys; Behold, I, even I, will bring a sword upon you, and I will destroy your high places.

verses.name: Ezekiel 6:4
verses.text: And your altars shall be desolate, and your images shall be broken: and I will cast down your slain men before your idols.
